duties_responsibilities.duty: Act as the main point of contact for clients, building and maintaining strong relationships.
Manage a portfolio of assigned clients, identifying opportunities for business growth and actively seeking new sales opportunities.
Develop and execute effective sales strategies to meet and exceed sales targets.
Negotiate and close sales deals with potential clients.
Provide regular reports on sales activities, forecasts, and performance.
Collaborate with internal teams to address customer needs and provide solutions.
